member.name: T:Ict.Petra.Shared.Interfaces.Plugins.MSysMan.IUserAuthentication
member.summary: This interface defines which methods need to be implemented by a plugin for authentication of users e.g. you can authenticate against an LDAP server or use the authentication of another application that the users are already using

member.name: M:Ict.Petra.Shared.Interfaces.Plugins.MSysMan.IUserAuthentication.AuthenticateUser(System.String,System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: return true if the user is known and the password is correct; otherwise returns false and an error message

member.name: M:Ict.Petra.Shared.Interfaces.Plugins.MSysMan.IUserAuthentication.SetPassword(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: this will allow the system administrator to change the password of the user

member.name: M:Ict.Petra.Shared.Interfaces.Plugins.MSysMan.IUserAuthentication.SetPassword(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: this will allow the user to change his own password

member.name: M:Ict.Petra.Shared.Interfaces.Plugins.MSysMan.IUserAuthentication.CreateUser(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: this will create a new user

member.name: M:Ict.Petra.Shared.Interfaces.Plugins.MSysMan.IUserAuthentication.GetAuthenticationFunctionality(System.Boolean@,System.Boolean@,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: which functionality is implemented by this dll

member.name: T:Ict.Petra.Shared.Interfaces.Plugins.MFinance.IElectronicPaymentBankExport
member.summary: This interface defines which methods need to be implemented by a plugin for exporting data to a bank for electronic payment e.g. see Ict.Plugin.EP.Germany for the DTAUS text file export

member.name: M:Ict.Petra.Shared.Interfaces.Plugins.MFinance.IElectronicPaymentBankExport.WriteFile(System.String,System.Xml.XmlNode)
member.summary: Write a file for the bank using the data defined in XML

member.name: T:Ict.Petra.Shared.Interfaces.Plugins.MFinance.IImportBankStatement
member.summary: this should be implemented for all sorts of bank file formats that contain the bank statements

member.name: M:Ict.Petra.Shared.Interfaces.Plugins.MFinance.IImportBankStatement.GetFilterGifts
member.summary: should return the text for the filter for AEpTransactionTable to get all the gifts, by transaction type

member.name: M:Ict.Petra.Shared.Interfaces.Plugins.MFinance.IImportBankStatement.ImportBankStatement(System.Int32@)
member.param: this returns the first key of a statement that was imported. depending on the implementation, several statements can be created from one file
